author: ruwan
msg: Improved the POJOCommand mediator with the property getting back to the message after the execution, this fixes the issue SYNAPSE-182 as well. Now the configuration for the pojo command properties has an optional attribute to specify the action as [action="get|set"] defaults to [action="set"]
